Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support

Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AeIMACorrelations.IAeCorrelationSetFilter Filters the correlation sets used to produce set of paths for conflictingReceives test.
IAeCompensationCallback Interface for the invoker of a scope's compensation method.
IAeCorrelationListener Callback interface for reporting that the correlation set has been initialized.
IAeCorrelations Interface that encapsulates the initiation or validation of an activity's correlations from a message.
IAeIMACorrelations Provides additional methods for correlations used for inbound message activities.
IAeLoopActivity An interface for containers that loop.
 

Class Summary
AeActivityParent Base class for implementation objects that are parents for a single activity.
AeAlarmCalculator Schedules the alarm for an activity.
AeBaseEvent Base class for message and alarm events.
AeCompensationHandler Models the compensateHandler that is part of a scope or process.
AeCompInfo An AeCompInfo object represents a single successful execution of a scope activity.
AeCoordinationContainer Support container to manage coordinated acitivites for a scope.
AeCoordinatorCompensationHandler Compensation handler for a coordinated invoke activity.
AeCoordinatorCompInfo CompensationInfo wrapper for coordinated activities.
AeCorrelationSet Models a correlationSet defined as part of a scope or process.
AeCorrelationsImpl impl for the used by a wsio activity
AeCorrelationsPatternImpl Uses the pattern attribute when initiating or validating correlations sets
AeDefaultFaultHandler Implementation of CatchAll fault handler.
AeElse Implements the optional 'else' child of the 'if' activity.
AeElseIf Implements the 'elseif' child of the 'if' activity.
AeEventHandlers Models the events that may occur within a scope or pick
AeEventHandlersContainer Models the eventHandlers in a scope activity.
AeFault Models BPEL fault objects.
AeFaultHandler Models the catch and catchAll providing a place to store the child activity for the fault.
AeFCTHandler Base class for Fault, Compensation, and Termination handlers.
AeIf An implementation object for the first boolean clause of an if activity.
AeIMACorrelations Handles requests for correlation info needed when queuing the message receiver.
AeImplicitCompensationHandler Implements the logic for the implicit compensation handler.
AeImplicitFaultHandler Implements the implicit fault handling routine which is simply to run the default compensation routine followed by rethrowing of the fault.
AeImplicitTerminationHandler Implicit version of termination handler that contains the default compensate activity
AeInvokeRetryPolicy Encapsulates all of the retry code for the invoke activity
AeLink Models the links that are defined within a flow.
AeOnAlarm Models the onAlarm in a pick or in the eventHandlers.
AeOnEvent The onEvent for a scope provides support for concurrent handling of messages.
AeOnEventCorrelations Impl for the correlations used for onEvent.
AeOnMessage Models the onMessage that is part of a pick or the eventHandlers.
AeOpenMessageActivityInfo Contains information about an inbound open message activities that have been consumed by a receiver such as the BPEL Receive or OnMessage, but not responded to.
AeParticipantCompensator AeParticipantCompensator implements an 'implicit' compensate activity for the process under coordination.
AeProcessCompensationCallbackWrapper wrapper used to ensure that the process transitions from running to completed when the process level compensation is complete.
AeRepeatableOnAlarm Implementation of a repeatable alarm for use when a scope onAlarm contains the repeatEvery syntax.
AeScopedObject Implements a convenience base class for implementation objects that are bound to a scope.
AeScopeSnapshot A snapshot of the process variables for use in compensation.
AeSupportActivityLocationPathSuffix Lists the location paths suffixes used by the support activity.
AeTerminationHandler TerminationHandler provides explicit way of providing behavior for a scope that is being terminated.
AeWSBPELCorrelationSet Extension of the correlation set impl object that implments the rules for initiating/validating a correlation set for WS-BPEL 2.0
AeWSBPELFaultHandler Impl of fault handler for WS-BPEL 2.0
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support Description

Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities. These include objects like correlationSets, onMessage, and switchCase objects.
